name: Nova (MIKAMIKA_Drawz)
description:
Waking up randomly on a beach to then witness a crash landing of a pod is strange, but to also find a child in that pod unconscious  is beyond what most would expect to happen in the middle of the night. 

You'll be given different choices and puzzles to solve that will determine the outcome of your story.

Right now this isn't done, so it doesn't  look the best right now (since it was done for school) but if I feel like enough people like it then I'll probably finish it. :)
